Articles.Content:
I am looking for pluggins to add to the RasterProp Monitor mod, as well as a version of Hangar Extended that is compatible for version 1.2.2. I have not heard too many good things about the lastest KSP version which is why I am staying in 1.2.2.

Does anyone know where I can locate these resources?

I want to build gigantic megacruisers that can give full readouts on all available resources.

On 12/26/2017 at 5:47 PM, JazzCorpDivo said:

Does anyone know where I can locate these resources?

The best place to ask questions about a specific mod is generally in the mod's forum thread, since that's where the experts in that mod tend to hang out.  These can generally be found in about five seconds by googling them. 

Perhaps try posting there?

On 12/26/2017 at 5:47 PM, JazzCorpDivo said:

I have not heard too many good things about the lastest KSP version which is why I am staying in 1.2.2.

Well, that's your prerogative, of course, but you're swimming against the stream, because mod authors tend to have very little incentive to update their mods for older KSP versions, since very few users stick with those.  Certainly I never have (and never will) issue bugfixes or updates for any of my mods for older KSP versions; it's just not worth it, since the vast majority of players prefer to use the latest, most updated version of KSP with all the fixes and such.

(FWIW, I've been happily playing 1.3.1 with all my favorite mods, myself, and it works great.)

That said, though, most mods also have their entire prior version history available, so if there's a mod that was around in KSP 1.2.2, chances are high that its old 1.2.2 version is still available for download.  Of course, that'll be an old version of the mod, so it won't have the latest features and bugfixes and such, but if you're determined to play with an obsolete KSP version, that's probably an available option for you.
